description:
Cooper hadn't gotten off in about a week.
"My girlfriend gave me a blow job last weekend," he said.
"You mean your fiancee?" I teased.
"Yeah," he said, smiling.
"So why did you decide to come back?" I asked.
"To experiment, I guess," he replied.
Emory was sitting next to him, grinning like a Cheshire cat. He liked Cooper a lot. I could tell.
When asked if he'd ever had his ass licked, Cooper's eyes kind of went back and forth, like he didn't know what to say.
"Ummm... not really," he said.
I wasn't sure what to expect from Cooper. He'd surprised me the night before when we took him out to dinner and he said a prayer before he ate.
So I was really surprised when he took the lead and started making out passionately with Emory. It's always the shy, conservative ones you have to look out for!
title: Cooper Gets Blown
